title: Quick eggs Benedict
ingredients: ['125g ready-prepared asparagus tips', '100g unsalted butter', '5 eggs', '1 tbsp lemon juice', '2 tbsp half-fat crème fraîche', '4 plain or wholegrain English muffins, split in half', '8 thin slices cooked ham or Parma ham, about 200g total weight', '2 tsp vinegar']
